availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles S. Norton (Chautauqua County, New York, merchant and county clerk)

body.p: Chautauqua County, New York, merchant and county clerk. Vermont native. Married to Harriet Norten. Father of Laurette Norten. Merchant in Chautauqua County in 1860. County clerk in Chautauqua County in 1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, New York, Chautauqua County, Carroll, p. 46; New York Wills and Probate Records, 1659-1999, Chautauqua County, New York, Administrator Bonds, Volume 1, 1871-1883, p. 47.
